name: Soundry AI
headline: Professional Quality AI Music Creation
description: We have built a universal text-to-sound AI generator for musicians and sound designers. Music producers build songs with samples that they've hand crafted with our AI, and sound designers can incorporate generated sound effects into film, TV, and video games. With personalized generations and training data hand-picked by your favorite artists, Soundry AI is your new best friend in the music creation process.

founders.name: Mark Buckler, Founder/CEO
founders.description: I would describe myself as an endlessly curious, ambitious, and creative person. In all my work, I begin by identifying the most important goals and questioning any built-in assumptions. This first principles approach frequently leads me to unique solutions which span multiple levels of hierarchy. I’ve made contributions in many fields including generative AI, robotics, biomedical imaging, computer vision, hardware acceleration, and computer architecture.

founders.name: Justin Parus, Founder
founders.description: Our team is building technology to democratize professional music production. I used to work on the cloud.

founders.name: Diandre Ruiz, Founder
founders.description: CPO of Generative AI company: Soundry AI

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Soundry AI**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W24, Soundry AI is a Seattle-based startup on a mission to revolutionize music creation through professional-quality AI tools. With a compact team of three passionate individuals, Soundry AI initially emerged as a universal text-to-sound generator tailored for musicians and sound designers alike. 

### What They Do
Soundry AI empowers music producers to craft original tracks using AI-generated samples tailored to their personal styles. They provide sound designers with an array of custom sound effects to enhance film, TV, and video game productions. Essentially, this tool becomes a creative partner in the music-making process, allowing artists to harness AI while keeping their personal touch intact.

### The Product
The product offers generative AI tools, including text-to-sound capabilities and endless sample packs. Users can expect features like easy exploration of unique variations on sounds, leading to better and more personalized results compared to typical sample libraries. Soundry AI aims to cut down production time while delivering high-quality results and maintaining an incredibly user-friendly interface that appeals to both novices and seasoned creators.

### The Community
Artists are at the heart of Soundry AI. The company actively collaborates with musicians, compensating them for the utilization of their songs and sounds to train the AI. This ties back nicely to their philosophy—built for artists, by artists. User testimonials highlight the exciting prospects that Soundry AI brings to the creative process, with many praising its capacity to spark inspiration and streamline the workflow.

### Join the Wave
Soundry AI is positioning itself not just as a tool, but as a community-focused platform, inviting aspiring artists to start for free, explore partnership opportunities, and join their Discord for ongoing engagement.

So, if you're a musician or sound designer looking to elevate your creative projects while saving time, **[check them out here](https://soundry.ai/)**, and see how AI can become your next best collaborator.
